title: Living tomorrow. No. 107
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Design of a limpet for deep sea divers to use on rocks and pipelines for balance; DNA laboratory testings - a new anti-biotic which distorts the double spiral of DNA and prevents multiplication of cancerous cells; development of Dunlop tyres to prevent blow outs at high speed; family project for printing individual T-shirts from special crayons.
